DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective trial demonstrate safety feasibility treat coronary artery lesion previously treat TRIMAXX Coronary stent system compare report result commercially available non-drug elute coronary stent system indicate treatment .
DOC.detailed_description: The TriMaxx study prospective , multicenter , non-randomized , single-arm trial intend demonstrate safety feasibility TriMaxx Cornary Stent System . The study enroll 100 subject de novo native coronary artery lesion meet eligibility criterion agree participate study . Subjects enrol sequential manner . The safety feasibility TRIMAXX stent evaluate compare MACE rate observe 30 day post-procedure MACE rate commercially available non-drug eluting stent . Secoandry evaluation include analysis clinical angiographic parameter 6 month . All subject undergo assessment 30 day 6 month . Additionally , subject undergo follow-up angiogram 6 month .
DOC.criteria: Eligible catheter base treatment Single coronary lesion require treatment Lesion accessible stent device Completes inform consent participation Stable condition ( symptoms heart attack within 72 hour prior treatment ) Normal lab value Previous treatment affect artery
